item.description: A ticket issued by the commander to those who have aided the Research Commission. Show it to the Smithy!

item.name: Lunastra Tail
item.description: Rare Lunastra material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Stiff, used to craft gear.

item.name: Xeno'jiiva Horn
item.description: A rare Xeno'jiiva horn. During growth, it's theorized that it helps control the beast's power.

item.name: Xeno'jiiva Gem
item.description: A phantasmal gem formed inside the tissue of Xeno'jiiva. The power it holds defies comprehension.

item.name: Elder Dragon Blood
item.description: Contains an unknown compound. The object of much scholarly research.

item.name: Deviljho Scalp
item.description: Rare Deviljho material. Obtained by breaking its head. Unusual, used in select gear.

item.name: Deviljho Tallfang
item.description: Rare Deviljho material. Obtained by breaking its head. Stout, used in many weapons.

item.name: Deviljho Gem
item.description: A rare gem said to have formed within Deviljho tissue. Used to dramatically improve gear.
